name: canshare-who-haematology-all-histology
title: NZ WHO haematolymphoid acute lymphoblastic leukaemia histology
description: Histologies used for acute lymphoblastic leukaemia (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours, latest edition) or an 'Other' value.

filter.value: ^297031000210104 |New Zealand World Health Organization classification of tumors 5th edition hematolymphoid acute lymphoblastic leukemia histology reference set| OR 74964007 |Other|

contains.display: B lymphoblastic leukaemia lymphoma with defined genetic alterations
B lymphoblastic leukaemia lymphoma with ETV6::RUNX1-like features
B lymphoblastic leukaemia lymphoma with hyperdiploidy
B lymphoblastic leukaemia lymphoma with hypodiploidy (Hypodiploid ALL)
B lymphoblastic leukaemia lymphoma with iAMP21
B lymphoblastic leukaemia lymphoma with t(12;21)(p13;q22); TEL-AML1 (ETV6-RUNX1)
B lymphoblastic leukaemia lymphoma with t(1;19)(q23;p13.3); E2A-PBX1 (TCF3-PBX1)
B lymphoblastic leukaemia lymphoma with t(5;14)(q31;q32); IL3-IGH
B lymphoblastic leukaemia lymphoma with t(9;22)(q34;q11.2); BCR-ABL1
B lymphoblastic leukaemia lymphoma with t(v;11q23); MLL rearranged
B lymphoblastic leukaemia lymphoma with TCF3::HLF fusion
B lymphoblastic leukaemia lymphoma without defining characteristics
Early T cell precursor lymphoblastic leukaemia/lymphoma
T cell lymphoblastic leukaemia/lymphoma without defining characteristics
